data.eml:eml: First record of the genus Ptilocerus in the Australian Region, with the description of two new species (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Malipatil, M. B. (2018): First record of the genus Ptilocerus in the Australian Region, with the description of two new species (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae). Zootaxa 4410 (1): 177-189, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4410.1.10
